item.description:
This event is for those who have joined this meetup group, but have not yet attended a meetup. Come join Michael and I at Bertuccis in Brookline.

Any one is welcome to join this event, but hope to see some new faces.


On the street parking or D line Brookline village
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait outside. call me at 617-470-4118 if you can't find me

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: New member event at Bertuccis
